steps.message:
Welcome aboard! Your ship is damaged.
Use WASD to move. Press E near orange repair points.

First, repair the REACTOR to restore power.
Follow the highlighted path to the central room.

Good! Now repair the SHIELDS for defense.
Head to the shield room above.

Shields online! Repair a WEAPON to fight back.
Go to the left weapon bay.

Weapons ready! Finally, repair the ENGINE.
Head to the engine room below.

All systems operational! Enemies will now attack.
Press Tab to view exterior. Good luck!
